# üêû Bug Report

### Description

I am testing client interop between Lodestar BN and Prysm VC. I have set both `--enable-beacon-rest-api --beacon-rest-api-provider http://<host>:<port>` flags to use the REST API instead of grpc.

The current problem seems to be that Prysm does not set a Content-Type header in POST requests which cause issues on Lodestar and likely also other CLs.

I would suggest that Prysm sets `'content-type': 'application/json'` in all POST requests that send JSON.

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

Unlikely

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

Run Lodestar BN with default flags and connect a Prysm VC with `--enable-beacon-rest-api --beacon-rest-api-provider http://<host>:<port>` flags.

## üî• Error

Error on Lodestar BN
```
Sep-08 13:07:05.286[rest]            error: Req req-27u prepareBeaconProposer error  Unsupported Media Type: undefined
```

## üåç  Your Environment

**Operating System:**

Linux

**What version of Prysm are you running? (Which release)**

`Prysm/v4.0.8/0ca3644057e27966a446051fe3bc3389a1add54e`
